description:
Gamo-chan and Yosshi offer to let Senpai touch their breasts, but there’s a twist. Nagatoro offers a reward if Senpai does a good drawing of her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senpai, Kao Makkassu yoo? / Senpai wa, Mou Chotto.....
Senpai, du bist knallrot im Gesicht / Senpai, du solltest dich mal mehr …
T`es tout rouge ! / Tu devrais un peu plus...
You`re All Red, Senpai / Senpai, You Could Be a Little More...
センパイ, 顔真っ赤っスよ~? / センパイは, もうちょっと.....
